alfredsnippet.snippet:
D. D. Palmer, The Science, Art and Philosophy of Chiropractic, p.542

"In the early years of Chiropractic I used the terms Innate (Spirit), Innate Intelligence (Spiritual Intellect), Universal Intelligence (God) because they were comprehensive, and the world was not prepared to receive the latter terms just mentioned in parentheses. It may be even now premature to use them."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Chiropractic
